text.section: This section applies only to the Executive and Legislative branches of State government.

section.section: On request and to the extent feasible, a unit that holds a public hearing shall provide a qualified interpreter to assist deaf persons to understand the proceeding.
The request must be submitted in writing or by telecommunication at least 5 days before the proceeding begins.
Whether providing an interpreter is feasible shall be determined, in each instance, by the unit involved.
